Glad to hear you've been having a good time Phil... I myself have 
never read the manga only because I have the untranslated manga and 
am studying Nihon-go (little progress though). 

That's kind of interesting that they'd know about Fujita... Who 
leaked it? I wonder if it's a mistake by Watsuki since if those kind 
of rumors were up and about, being an undercover agent would be no 
good. Come to think of it, Fujita going about as a policeman by day 
and then also going undercover on the side, it's a little weird for 
me.

I'm wondering if at this point in the manga, did it still matter? 

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> 
wrote:
> Same message, but with the repaired link...
>  
> I've been busily and happily (obsessively?) capturing images from 
the RK manga (thanks to Grace!) of Saitou (up to 880, maybe 2/3 of 
the way through the Jinchuu arc) and ran into this.  This is the 
first time I've seen the manga in its original format and I'm 
running into things that either I hadn't noticed before or had 
forgotten.  I don't remember the men in the Tokyo jail gossiping 
about who Fujita really is.  Reminded me of discussions we've had 
about whether or not people in the department knew his true identity.
> 
> Anyway, I've uploaded that portion of page 19 from chapter 218 
> (volume 25) of the manga into the Photos section.  Wasn't sure if 
it was appropriate to any of the folders, so it's just sitting there 
on its own.  Sweet little scene.
> 
>
